sentence.Network_en: The analysis results show jamming DSCS down route by the blastoff plat is a better method.
sentence.Network_cn: 分析结果表明,利用升空干扰平台干扰DSCS下行链路是一种较好的干扰方式.

PerfectNetExp.abs: blastoderm 胚盘blastoff 升空blastomere 分裂球
blastodisc 胚膜, blastoff 发火起飞, blastodisk 胚层

list.abs: blastoff是名词形式,例如a successful blastoff(成功发射)。 表示“发射”之意的词最常见的还有launch,比如Jiuquan Satellite Launch Center(酒泉卫星发射中心)。.

entry.def: Blast-off is the moment when a rocket leaves the ground and rises into the air to begin a journey into space.

example.ex: The original planned launch was called off four minutes before blast-off.
example.tran: 原定的发射在点火起飞前4分钟被取消。

means.word_mean: 1. the launching of a missile or spacecraft to a specified destination

auth_sentence.content: The spacecraft ran into problems shortly after blastoff Friday.
auth_sentence.res_content: The spacecraft ran into problems shortly after blastoff Friday.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The spacecraft ran into problems shortly after blastoff Friday.
